comments.author: Doron Cohen
comments.body:
These too - 
 svn pset svn:eol-style native conf/standard-config.xml 
 svn pset svn:eol-style native conf/standard.alg
 svn pset svn:eol-style native src/java/org/apache/lucene/benchmark/byTask/feeds/package.html
 svn pset svn:eol-style native src/java/org/apache/lucene/benchmark/byTask/package.html
 svn pset svn:eol-style native src/java/org/apache/lucene/benchmark/byTask/programmatic/package.html
 svn pset svn:eol-style native src/java/org/apache/lucene/benchmark/byTask/stats/package.html
 svn pset svn:eol-style native src/java/org/apache/lucene/benchmark/byTask/tasks/package.html
 svn pset svn:eol-style native src/java/org/apache/lucene/benchmark/byTask/utils/package.html
 svn pset svn:eol-style native src/java/package.html

description:
The following files in contrib/benchmark don't have eol-style set to native, so when they are checked out, they don't get converted.

./build.xml:                    
./CHANGES.txt:                                                             
./conf/sample.alg:                                                                                
./conf/standard.alg:                                                                           
./conf/sloppy-phrase.alg:                                                                                 
./conf/deletes.alg:                                                                                         
./conf/micro-standard.alg:                                                                   
./conf/compound-penalty.alg:
